column4: 8.10 64 bit, using a GTX 260 and 8800 GTS, I've tried both the 177 drives Ubuntu offers and manual install of 185 that nvidia recomends... but I can't get either to work (GDM refuses to start), any suggestions?
Terminal is good enough.   Try "envyng-core" in the terminal.
Check 'My Computer' and look at CD/DVD device.
